title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-n - Notice of dismissal of indictment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-n - Notice of dismissal of indictment

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-n
12/88
STATE OF NEW YORK
OFFICE OF MENTAL HEALTH/
OFFICE OF MENTAL RETARDATION AND DEVELOPMENTAL
DISABILITIES
NOTICE OF DISMISSAL OF INDICTMENT
TO: ________
________
________
The Commissioner of (OMH) (OMRDD) was served
on ________, 19 ________, with an order of the ________ Court, County of
________, dismissing the indictment against ________, a patient presently in
the custody of the Commissioner pursuant to order of such court and confined at
your facility. Authority to retain the above-named patient
will cease thirty days from the date of said service. The patient should
therefore be examined and a determination made as to the need for continued
in-patient care and treatment. If the patient is found to be mentally ill or
mentally defective and in need of continued in-patient care and treatment, the

Director should proceed in accordance with the appropriate provisions of the

Mental Hygiene Law and section
111.7
of the Rules of the Chief

Administrator of the Courts (adopted as a regulation of the Office of Mental

Health by section 9.1 of Title 14 NYCRR). ________
For the Commissioner of
(OMH) (OMRDD)

Dated: ________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-n

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
